description:
Become a racing king: captivating campaign, unique events with exclusive cars, various game modes, and realistic CarX physics.
Powerful cars are waiting for you!

#1 racing on traffic-packed highways.
A mix of lifelike physics which have been the center point of CarX Drift Racing Online, eye-catching graphics, and extreme racing on traffic-packed tracks is what CarX Highway Racing has to offer.

CAMPAIGN MODE. Immerse yourself in the world of street racing.
- Drive through Texas deserts, visit Australia, France, Russia, and other countries on your way to success.
- Uncover the secrets of underground organizations and destroy Winston’s secret empire.
- Discover all the Syndicate’s secrets and stop them before it’s too late.
- Make new friends who can help you in your endeavors.

GREAT CAR SELECTION. Choose from pickup trucks to modern hypercars.
- Over 40 cars are waiting for you: sports classic, regular vehicles, powerful muscle cars and supercars.

REALISTIC PHYSICS. Feel the power of the car in your hands.
- Well-tuned physics will allow you to feel every horsepower of the car.
- Upgrade your car’s parts to enhance its performance.

COMPETITIVE RACING. Show others what you’ve got.
- Compete with other players for the first place.
- Move up the leagues by winning races and beating your rivals’ time.

VARIOUS GAME MODES. You won’t get bored.
- Select Time Attack, race to stay in the pack, or complete your run without a scratch.

POLICE MODE. Show everyone who the law is around here.
- Stand on the side of justice and take down troublemakers before they escape.
- Strike fear into the hearts of criminals with the roar of your engine and your flashing lights.

UNIQUE EVENTS. These are your chance to get powerful cars.
- Take part in various events and get unique cars.

VISUAL CUSTOMIZATION. Show your colors.
- Change every part of your car: mirrors, lights, skirting, bumpers, or choose body kits! No limits for your imagination.

FREE RIDE MODE. Feel the freedom of movement.
- Unlimited mode which will allow you to enjoy driving and take a break from the endless chases.
- Compete with rivals and get great rewards.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL!
- Day/Night mode: drive around Paris in the evening or raise dust of night Texas highways or under the scorching Australian sun.
- Flee from the police: patrol cars will keep you on your toes until you cross the finish line, and confronting them is a separate test.
name: CarX Highway Racing
